email_layout.display_value: ARMS - User Profile Creation Email Layout

sysevent_email_template.message_html:
Dear ${name},

Welcome to the Urenco account team. Please note the important details provided below.

Number: ${number}

Expected Assignment End Date: ${expected_assignnment_end_date}

Expiry Date: ${expiry_date}

Your user profile creation in the URENCO application has been completed. You may now access your application for raising the elevated access rights request.

Also please ensure all training is done, as indicated, and your profile updated accordingly.

Best Regards,
Urenco Security Management
sysevent_email_template.name: ARMS - Email Template
sysevent_email_template.subject: URENCO - Your User Profile Creation Request ${number} has been completed.
